com.brogrammers.agora.data

Class DeviceUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brogrammers.agora.model.Author
      • com.brogrammers.agora.data.DeviceUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DeviceUser
extends Author
    The DeviceUser is a specialized singleton instance of an Author, which represents the current user of an instance of the application and stores user settings. All new Questions, Answers, and Comments will use the DeviceUser's name as the author.
    Author:
    Group02
